extendedInfo.description: MediaHouse Forum: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/mediahouse-upnp-dlna-appStream music, videos, movies and pictures from PC, NAS or any other device running UPnP/DLNA compliant media server. MediaHouse Pro powers your device i.e. phone, tablets or google TVs with the following capabilities:1. Automatic scan of your home network over Ethernet or Wifi to identify PC, NAS or any other device running UPnP/DLNA media server.2. Shows capabilities of the scanned servers by dividing them into two categories, one from which you can serve content i.e. called Play From and others to which you can play that content i.e. called Play To.3. Use MediaHouse Pro as a browser, player or controller. 4. MediaHouse Pro can control playback of content from a Media Server (called - Play From) to a Media renderer (called - Play To).5. Movies - Spice up your movie libraries with posters, backdrops, actors and more information gathered from online sources such as TMDb.6. Favorites - Save several level deep albums and folders from one or multiple media servers and get direct one click access to their content.7. Play lists - add, delete, rename music play lists. Last played audio tracks are automatically saved. 8. Search your big server libraries for albums, artists, video, images by their title.9. Download - albums, folders and individual media items to your device for offline play.10. Random play - discover hidden gems in your library by letting app select music for you.11. Built in music player with options to seek, pause, play, loop, shuffle and repeat.12. Build in photo viewer with slideshow option.13. Image Colors are picked from album art or photos to beautify now playing and photo view screens.14. Time saver folder options like search audio and play or search images and arrange them in a slideshow.15. Remembers your server selection and uses it in subsequent runs.16. Video play in NOT BUILT IN and MediaHouse uses other applications installed on your device. We recommend installing MXPlayer or BSPlayer, Moboplayer etc... They have support for many HD video file formats.17. Support for Landscape mode18. Displays album art and album thumb nails19. Further Tips are available via menu optionTHIS APP DOES NOT CLAIM TO BE DLNA CERTIFIED. Check http://www.dlna.org/consumer-home/look-for-dlna/product-search. However, here is a brief list of what our users are using today with MediaHouse. UPnp/DLNA Servers ------------------1. TwonkyMedia server2. Windows Media Player 123. TVersity4. Serviio5. XBMC6. PS3 Media Server7. MediaMonkey 4.0Â 8. Synology DSM 3.19. MediaTomb10. MiniDLNA11. PURE FlowserverUPnP/DLNA Players ------------------1. Windows Media Player 12 (Has good audio and video support)2. Sony Network Media Players (Good audio but limited support on video playback).3. And of course your phone or tablet works as always.Tags : Movies, Music, Photos, Videos, TV shows, movie browser, music player, network player, media center, video player, Boxee, XBMC, Plex, MediaPortal.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Using with a Vortexbox and high end hifi. Works great finds the Vortexbox in both Squeezebox and DLNA modes. Finds Vortexbox player, my Arcam AVR amp and the Netgear Duo NAS. Some issues with album name duplication on DLNA but thats no biggie.
reviews.author: David Kibble

reviews.title: Good...needs work
reviews.comment: Search library and seek track don\'t work. Needs new icon! Otherwise This Is Awesome!
reviews.author: Jules Barrell

reviews.title: Feature packed & Stable
reviews.comment: Really solid app with great features, fast directory scanning. Updates movie info & art with ease. Keep those updates coming.
reviews.author: Dean Crowe

reviews.title: Nice Job
reviews.comment: Nice Job pics up my video libraries well and can play to phone via UPNP or whatever or can be Flung over to a TV connected device to stream for big screen viewing Pretty Cool
reviews.author: John Smith

reviews.title: PS3 Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: False advertising, promised to be able to link automatically to PS3, App could not detect PS3, contacted provider, result no support; got a deflection trying to blame PS3; also NO instructions provided by App or site.  Save your money.
reviews.author: Tao \'Gary\'

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Wow one of the best and most useful apps on the play store finds all my movies and downloads cover art and descriptions with amazing accuracy
reviews.author: Doug Ganey

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. Use with MX player pro for great video playback. Hopefully get TV series support and trailer feature soon
reviews.author: Aaron Durban

reviews.title: Weird bug, generally really well made
reviews.comment: When I have a preferred server selected and want to use a different one, even when I select the other one it still shows the preferred one.  I also can\'t use the movies feature with windows media server. I select a location for movies but when I use the shortcut, it just gives an error. When I navigate the long way to the folder marked as a movie folder it works most of the time. I wish when it wasn\'t sure of a movie match, it just used thew first one and has a small visual clue saying it didn\'t find a per,
reviews.author: Ben O\'Halloran

reviews.title: Works really well
reviews.comment: Found my Win 7 media without any delay and works great for browsing the media. You do need a video player, I use Doubletwist. Using a Razr Maxx.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app. Does what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: Tried it. Like it. Bought the pro version.
reviews.author: Paul Martinez

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: Nexus 7. Works well. Thanks
reviews.author: Calvin Munro

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Perfect! Works well on my HTC desire hd and HTC media link connected via a Netgear DLNA router.
reviews.author: sean bruton

reviews.title: Awesome one of the best used
reviews.comment: The best app i have paid for and use, i can stream all my movies via my Pc server using Nero home 4 via my android tablet to all my smart tvs, updates movie art and info very stable. My only wish if it could do the same for all my tv series such as artwork and episode info!!! would be happy to pay more for this service
reviews.author: Rick R

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: But please get prettier icon :p (no offence meant..)
reviews.author: Dustin Harman

reviews.title: Good but.....  Can we have...
reviews.comment: More choice in picture thumbnail view.   I get one list of small icons and a load of wasted screen space,  need grid view like gallery app.   Thanks.   Also...  If i start to play a music track then go somewhere in the browser,  then click to go to the playing track there\'s no way to get back to the album folder of the playing track without browsing from the root folder.   Needs easy way to put an album on without having to make a play list.  Should work more like the in built gallery and music player.
reviews.author: Steve Hand

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: one of the best out there. badly needs \"tv series\" support and some widgets so us that use android sticks on out TVs can add it to the launcher. performance with a large library does get a bit slow too. running it on a dual core, it keeps pausing it to scroll down through the library.
reviews.author: Roland Lawrence

reviews.title: fantastic product
reviews.comment: able to stream all my movies via twonky media server. no lags,super smooth
reviews.author: Srikant Mishra

reviews.title: Does exactly what it claims to do
reviews.comment: Love it, because it\'s not flashy, it doesn\'t claim to analyze or interpret your data, it just plays your movies (and music and photos, but movies are really all I\'m interested in) from any DLNA media server (in my case a cheap little WD MyBook Live) using a clean, native-feeling interface and it does it well. If you want, it can try to fetch some info about your movies, but in difference to many other media players, it won\'t force you to do this.
reviews.author: Hans Schmucker

reviews.title: I\'m really enjoying this application
reviews.comment: I would like to see this application available on devices operating IOS.
reviews.author: Lucyna Waluszynska

reviews.title: Works great on Note 2 with seagate wifi 1tb hdd.
reviews.comment: Fantastic application..but one problem I am having is.../more often than not..some, but not all of my video folders do not appear although they are there and intact on my wireless seagate 1tb hdd....otherwise the app works great.
reviews.author: Stuart Grindlay
